data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 2, Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 3, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In Nagoya, Hidemasa Morita of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 6, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 8, Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Nagoya pushes forward through Mateus, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kawasaki.
Ryuji Sato signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Miki Yamane gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
In the minute 18, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Shintaro Kurumaya (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Yasuto Wakizaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
In the minute 22, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Gabriel Xavier (Nagoya) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Nagoya's area.
Yasuto Wakizaka for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kawasaki.
Goal! A Mu Kanazaki header gives Nagoya a 1-0 lead in Nagoya.
In the minute 44, Great play from Mateus to set up the goal.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ryota Ohshima is replacing Yasuto Wakizaka for Kawasaki at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 46, Reo Hatate is replacing Hokuto Shimoda for the away team.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 50, Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Kawasaki's Reo Hatate gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 52, Important block from the Nagoya defence as Reo Hatate fires in a strike for Kawasaki.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
The home team replace Gabriel Xavier with Yuki Soma.
In the minute 55, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Ryuji Sato signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 58, Reo Hatate (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a third substitution, with Yu Kobayashi replacing Leandro Damiao.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Nagoya's Yuki Soma is whistled for offside at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 69, Ryuji Sato awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Nagoya.
Toru Oniki is making the team's fourth substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Ao Tanaka replacing Akihiro Ienaga.
In the minute 72, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kaoru Mitoma.
Free kick Kawasaki.
Taisei Miyashiro (Kawasaki) has replaced the possibly injured Kaoru Mitoma at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 75, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Kawasaki's Reo Hatate gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 79, Ryuji Sato awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Oh Jae-suk is on a sub for Naoki Maeda for Nagoya.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 83, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nagoya push forward at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium and Mu Kanazaki gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kawasaki defence.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 85, Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 86, Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
Ryuji Sato signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Nagoya make their third substitution with Ryogo Yamasaki replacing Mateus.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki drives forward and Yu Kobayashi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kawasaki's Jesiel is on target but unsuccessful.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Nagoya's area.
That's full-time at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. The final score is 1-0.
Mitch Langerak (Nagoya) has received a first yellow card.
